articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: US finishes deportation of eight men to South Sudan after weeks of legal wrangling - NBC News
articles.description: Eight men deported from the United States in May and held under guard for weeks at an American military base in the African nation of Djibouti while their legal challenges played out in court have now reached the Trump administration’s intended destination, w…
articles.content: WASHINGTON Eight men deported from the United States in May and held under guard for weeks at an American military base in the African nation of Djibouti while their legal challenges played out in co… [+2358 chars]
